data.eml:eml: Eleven new species of the spider genus Althepus Thorell, 1898 (Araneae, Ochyroceratidae) from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Chang, Li, Fengyuan, Wongprom, Prasit, Zheng, Guo, Li, Shuqiang (2017): Eleven new species of the spider genus Althepus Thorell, 1898 (Araneae, Ochyroceratidae) from Thailand. Zootaxa 4350 (3): 469-499, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4350.3.3
